name: A Plot Story
description: Learn how a girl Lily managed to frustrate the plans of mean Duchess and to save the Crown Prince.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9 and Shader Model 3.0-compatible graphic adapter DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
